AGRARIAN.Definition: relating to the land or farming

HARVEST.Definition: the crops that have been gathered

DROUGHT.Definition: a period where there is very little rain

FAMINE.Definition: a situation where there is not enough food for the population

POLICYMAKERS.Definition: people who decide what a government's policies should be

REGENERATING.Definition: making something redevelop and grow back to its previous state

COUNTERPARTS.Definition: a person or thing that has the same job in a different place

ILLUSION.Definition: an idea of belief that isn't true

INCENTIVISE.Definition: to make someone want to do something

GUARANTEES.Definition: (of a product) a promise to repair or replace something if it breaks within a period of time

POWERHOUSES.Definition: countries with a lot of influence

RESILIENCE.Definition: the ability to survive despite difficult conditions

GOVERNANCE.Definition: the way in which a country is governed

RANK.Definition: have a position in a list

MINDSET.Definition: a way of thinking about something
